title: Debunked: No, Enoch Burke has not been sentenced to 'life' in prison
description: The court has never ordered Burke to accept and ideology, or even address someone by a pronoun.
content: CLAIMS THAT JAILED former teacher Enoch Burke has been sentenced to life in prison for his beliefs have spread internationally, despite Burke being free to leave prison by simply affirming he will no… [+6082 chars]
